locationMessage: Allow access to your location to get better experience using our Application

notificationMessage: Allow notification to stay up to date to our news

updateMessage: New version available, you should update it.
ziCreditslideOne: Get the chance! Invite your friend to join ZiBox and earn 1 point, also your invited friend will earn 1 point as a reward.
ziCreditslideTwo: Place your order on the ZiMarketplace and earn bonus points! The more you order, the more points you'll receive.
ziCreditslideThree: Unlock your first point as a welcome gift by creating your account on ZiBox! It's just a click away.
buyByPoint: Which Product you want to buy with your points?
referNote: After you apply invitation code, you can never change it.
referTitle: Gather your Friends, Grab your Points!
referOneText: Get 1 pt. = 1,000 IQD to your ZiCredit when you invite every one of your friends to signup.
referTwoText: When your friend successfully verifies their ZiBox account, you'll earn points that can be used in the points market to redeem exciting products for free.
referThreeText: Not only you but also your invited friend will get a point when accepting the invitation. Simply have your friend enter your unique invitation code on this page.
referFourText: Go through the same procedure as all your friends to accumulate the highest number of ZiCredit.

deleteMyAccountTitle: Do you want to confirm the deletion of your account on ZiBox?
deleteMyAccountText: You'll lose all the data and content in that account, like emails, photos, products, and your shop. You won't be able to use ZiBox platforms when you sign in with that account, like ZiMarketPlace, ZiTrade, ziServices, or Others. You'll lose access to your orders, chats and coupons.
canNotUpdateAddress: You can not update addresses while the order is being sent.
shareText:
ZiBox App is the leading hyper Local e-commerce platform in Iraq and the Middle East. You can find thousands of items in our marketplace, Sign up now and get a point as a reward!

https://zibox.io
